name: NBA Jam Extreme
description:
NBA JAM EXTREME is accelerated realism. Basketball through the prism of elevated performance. A voyage into the unconscious. Realism through adrenaline.

NEXT GENERATION NBA ACTION: ● All-new 3-D engine ● Ultra-realistic player movement through "Motion Capture Technology" ● Graphic detail that makes players look like their real-life counterparts ● Player attributes based on NBA stats ● Over 170 NBA players ● Playoffs, Finals and All-star Games ● Marv Albert at the play-by-play ● Over 30 outrageous new 'Extreme' dunks ● All-new 'Extreme' button elevates your game ● "Jam Cam" zooms in on game action ● Over 60 hidden players and secret teams ● Slam with 1 to 4 players
